overview:
Melissa is the founder and brainchild behind RiseTV1 a web channel which brings weekly news and business tips straight from the tech scene. This channel is intended to promote those that are on the rise and inspire future entrepreneurs.

Melissa also runs BrightVideos an internet video production company. They provide professional internet videos. Everything from event coverage to promotional videos. Melissa is an expert in technology and business start ups and often conducts most of the interviews. But Bright Videos also have other journalists on hand. Melissa also works closely with Shell LiveWire where she sits on the advisory panel helping start ups.
